credit_line: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
title: Unfinished Study of Rock (recto); Studies of Cliffs and Small Landscape (verso)
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
description: Recto: small, unfinished sketch of two hills; verso: quick sketches of three cliffs placed randomly on sheet. In upper left, small outline sketch of landscape.
name: Sketchbook folio
